What is Wuphf?
Watch The Office season 7 episode 9
How do I measure my dog\'s shoe size?
With a pink pencil
Do dogs use the same conditioner as humans?
Yes, but try to avoid head n\' shoulders
What\'s better- Dogs or Iguanas?
dogs
Can I adopt a robot here?
No
Can I adopt a dinosaur here??
No
Can I adopt an alien here?
Yes, but only 3 legged aliens
Dogs prefer potatoes or sweet potatoes?
When fried, they prefer sweet potatoes, but when cooked in water- potatoes.
When is the annual spelling contest for dogs? And can my dog apply?
Check out our events page, you will find everything you need to know in there
The annual spelling contest for dogs
Join us at the most exciting event of the year! The contest will be on Aug 18th, in the Dogs Spelling Academy in the city of Yokne\'am, at 8pm
Dogs can swin with pigs
On Sep 2nd we\'ll gather to support friendship between dogs and pigs. The event will take place in Ben Shekalim\'s place at 4pm
"Wine Tasting"
"Our dogs make the best wine! Come visit our Winery every friday for the best bonzo brunch in town!"
